title: Designating the IFC Colombo 1 and Gateway International Campus as Primary Businesses of Strategic Importance
decision_details: - It has been stipulated under the provisions of the Colombo Port City Economic Commission Act, No. 11 of 2021 that the approval of the Cabinet must be obtained in order to designate a business as a business of strategic importance and to grant exemptions or incentives to that business. The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotion to designate IFC Colombo 1 (PVT) LTD and Gateway International Campus (PVT) LTD which have been approved as authorized persons under the said provisions, as primary businesses of strategic importance and to grant proposed exemptions or incentives to those businesses, was approved by the Cabinet.
